mapper.select: select address.id, address.name, concat(r1.name, r2.name, r3.name, address.address) as detailed_address, address.mobile, address.is_default from cskaoyan_mall_address as address left join cskaoyan_mall_region as r1 on address.province_id = r1.code left join cskaoyan_mall_region as r2 on address.city_id = r2.code left join cskaoyan_mall_region as r3 on address.area_id = r3.code left join cskaoyan_mall_user as `user` on address.user_id = `user`.id where address.user_id = #{uid}

select address.id, address.name, address.province_id, r1.name as province_name, address.city_id, r2.name as city_name, address.area_id, r3.name as area_name, address.address, mobile, is_default from cskaoyan_mall_address as address left join cskaoyan_mall_region as r1 on address.province_id = r1.code left join cskaoyan_mall_region as r2 on address.city_id = r2.code left join cskaoyan_mall_region as r3 on address.area_id = r3.code where address.id = #{addressId}
mapper.update: update cskaoyan_mall_address set name = #{address.name}, mobile = #{address.mobile}, province_id = #{address.provinceId}, city_id = #{address.cityId}, area_id = #{address.areaId}, address = #{address.address}, is_default = #{address.isDefault}, update_time = now() where id = #{address.id}
